name: 3rd International Conference on Linguistics Sri Lanka 2017
content: International conference on Linguistics Sri Lanka ICLSL 2017, organized by department of Linguistics University of Kelaniya for the 3rd time is due to be held on the 21st, November 2017 Abstract deadline- 9h July 2017 Phonetics and phonology morphology and syntax sociolinguistics clinical linguistics translation studies sign language language planning language acquisition dialectical studies historical linguistics
